targets.expr: sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{ mode="system"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total[$__rate_interval])))
sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode="user"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total[$__rate_interval])))
sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{ mode="iowait"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total[$__rate_interval])))
sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{ mode=~".*irq"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total[$__rate_interval])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode!='idle',mode!='user',mode!='system',mode!='iowait',mode!='irq',mode!='softirq'}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total[$__rate_interval])))
sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{ mode="idle"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total[$__rate_interval])))

targets.expr: sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode="user"}[1m])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total[1m])))
sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{ mode="iowait"}[1m])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total[1m])))
sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{ mode=~".*irq"}[1m])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total[1m])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode!='idle',mode!='user',mode!='system',mode!='iowait',mode!='irq',mode!='softirq'}[1m])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total[1m])))
sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{ mode="idle"}[1m])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total[1m])))
